prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a collector's hands carefully holding a worn, antique postcard from the "Golden Age" (1905-1915). The postcard depicts a vibrant, turn-of-the-century street scene with horse-drawn carriages and pedestrians in period clothing. Focus on the texture of the aged paper, the faded colors, and the intricate details of the printing. Soft, diffused lighting to highlight the delicate nature of the object. Shallow depth of field, emphasizing the postcard while blurring the background. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6

prompt: A wide, landscape shot of a cluttered antique shop. In the foreground, a magnifying glass rests on a table filled with stacks of vintage postcards, each showing different scenes (coastal views, cityscapes, portraits). The background is filled with other antique items, creating a sense of history and discovery. Focus on the warm, inviting light filtering through the shop windows and the various textures and colors of the antiques. Composition should guide the eye from the postcards in the foreground to the depth of the shop. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6

prompt: A dramatic, low-angle shot of a pristine, first-edition postcard depicting a rare and valuable historical event (e.g., a famous shipwreck, early flight). Sharp focus and dramatic lighting to highlight the details of the image and the text. The composition should convey a sense of rarity and historical significance. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6

prompt: Split-screen composition. On the left, a high-resolution scan of a vintage postcard showing a bustling seaside resort in the early 20th century.
